Activity: Arrive at the office. Review schedule and prepare for the day. Check emails.
Compile all the feedback data received throughout the week.

Draft a final summary report, focusing on key findings, recommendations, and action items. Distribute this report to all relevant stakeholders (@itpm-1, @clinlead-1, @ehrv-1, @da-1, @da-2, @trainer-1) for their review and input.
Review feedback on the summary report. Incorporate any relevant suggestions or corrections. Finalize the report and distribute it to the wider project team.
Meet with @itpm-1 to discuss the project's overall progress, challenges, and next steps. Review the action plan and ensure that all tasks are assigned and prioritized appropriately.

Review the performance metrics and data quality reports generated by @da-1 and @da-2. Identify any areas where further investigation or corrective action is needed. Initiate follow-up discussions with the relevant team members.

Work with @mrs-1 and @mrs-2 (Medical Records Specialists) to address any outstanding issues related to data collection or documentation practices. Provide guidance and support to ensure data integrity and accuracy.
Prepare a communication to the stakeholders. @PEOPLE.
Final review of all tasks completed during the week. Update project documentation and ensure that all files are properly organized and archived.
Plan for next week: Review action items, identify priorities, and create a detailed task list.
